about_the_game:
In the game "The Beast in The Silene Valley" you find yourself in a post-apocalyptic world where every step you take could be your last. Your main goal is to find and collect a mysterious Artifact that has incredible power. But be careful: a terrible monster is waiting on your way, which guards the Artifact and will not allow you to take it just like that.

Players can decide how to act: hide from the monster, avoid meeting it, or engage in battle using three types of automatic weapons. For success, it is important to look for useful items that will help in the fight, as well as to pick up cartridges, because without them the chances of survival decrease dramatically.

The game world is full of dangers, so you will have to use all available skills: crouch to remain undetected, run to avoid pursuit, and jump over obstacles on the way to the goal. Collect resources, scavenge for anything that can help you in your battle with the monster, and prepare for the final showdown for the Artifact on which your life depends.

Can you survive this deadly quest and obtain the Artifact that will change your destiny? Embark on a journey full of horror, adrenaline and unforgettable adventures!

"The Beast in The Silene Valley" belongs to the horror shooter genre with elements of survival and exploration.
